alert.note: Alert for Butts; Greene; Hancock; Henry; Jasper; Madison; Morgan; Newton; Oglethorpe; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:46PM EDT until July 20 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hancock County in east central Georgia... Northeastern Butts County in central Georgia... Taliaferro County in east central Georgia... Wilkes County in east central Georgia... Southeastern Madison County in northeastern Georgia... Southeastern Newton County in north central Georgia... Warren County in east central Georgia... Morgan County in north central Georgia... Putnam County in central Georgia... East central Henry County in north central Georgia... Greene County in east central Georgia... Oglethorpe County in northeastern Georgia... Jasper County in central Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 646 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Carlton to Conyers, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Washington, Madison, Greensboro, Monticello, Warrenton, Sparta, Crawfordville, Union Point, Newborn, Tignall, Mansfield, Woodville, White Plains, Siloam, Carlton, Shady Dale, Norwood, Maxeys and Rayle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Greene; Hancock; Henry; Jasper; Madison; Morgan; Newton; Oglethorpe; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes
